messages.content: What is your prompt?
I will be asking you about your experience with job interviews. Can you tell me about a time when you had to prepare for a job interview?
I don't think you're using the right prompt
I apologize for the confusion. Let's get back on track. Can you please share your experience with interviews? What do you find challenging or rewarding about them?
this is about a research questions and you should ask what is  your prompt you should have an answer
What is your research question or prompt that you are currently exploring or investigating?
okay okay the mood indicator is not on I'm not kidding
I understand, let's troubleshoot this together. Have you tried restarting the device to see if the mood indicator comes back on?
I tried indicating that
Could you please provide more context or clarify your statement so we can continue with the interview?
I'm trying to do some debugging on the monitoring tool and some other tools together but  we're just going to put this okay
It sounds like you're working on debugging some monitoring tools. Can you tell me more about the specific issues you're encountering while trying to integrate these tools?
this page right here I suspect even though in the preferences it says that you are  interviewer

Hello, thank you for pointing that out. I am here to conduct an interview with you on the topic of 'General Interview'. Let's get started. Can you tell me about your experience with interviews in the past?

well much in the past I've had some good interviews with Daria some different names of DCA and their characters that are in the prompt library and they ask very specific questions based on their very specific instructions

That's great to hear that you've had positive interview experiences in the past. Could you please elaborate on the types of questions they asked you? Did they focus more on technical skills or behavioral aspects during the interviews?
okay I sent that one in we're doing pretty good I'm going to go to the monitoring we're going to look at a little bit of the monitoring

That sounds like a busy day for you! Could you tell me more about the monitoring process you are referring to? What specifically are you looking at and what are you hoping to achieve through this monitoring task?
getting a remote interview and at the same time there's someone back in the office monitoring our interview  and so far the live transcript is updating correctly  so that's good

That's great to hear that the remote interview and live transcription are going smoothly. How do you feel about having someone monitoring the interview from the office? Does it affect your performance in any way?

transcript:
Participant: What is your prompt?

Moderator: I will be asking you about your experience with job interviews. Can you tell me about a time when you had to prepare for a job interview?

Participant: I don't think you're using the right prompt

Moderator: I apologize for the confusion. Let's get back on track. Can you please share your experience with interviews? What do you find challenging or rewarding about them?

Participant: this is about a research questions and you should ask what is  your prompt you should have an answer

Moderator: What is your research question or prompt that you are currently exploring or investigating?

Participant: okay okay the mood indicator is not on I'm not kidding

Moderator: I understand, let's troubleshoot this together. Have you tried restarting the device to see if the mood indicator comes back on?

Participant: I tried indicating that

Moderator: Could you please provide more context or clarify your statement so we can continue with the interview?

Participant: I'm trying to do some debugging on the monitoring tool and some other tools together but  we're just going to put this okay

Moderator: It sounds like you're working on debugging some monitoring tools. Can you tell me more about the specific issues you're encountering while trying to integrate these tools?

Participant: this page right here I suspect even though in the preferences it says that you are  interviewer

Moderator: Hello, thank you for pointing that out. I am here to conduct an interview with you on the topic of 'General Interview'. Let's get started. Can you tell me about your experience with interviews in the past?

Participant: well much in the past I've had some good interviews with Daria some different names of DCA and their characters that are in the prompt library and they ask very specific questions based on their very specific instructions

Moderator: That's great to hear that you've had positive interview experiences in the past. Could you please elaborate on the types of questions they asked you? Did they focus more on technical skills or behavioral aspects during the interviews?

Participant: okay I sent that one in we're doing pretty good I'm going to go to the monitoring we're going to look at a little bit of the monitoring

Moderator: That sounds like a busy day for you! Could you tell me more about the monitoring process you are referring to? What specifically are you looking at and what are you hoping to achieve through this monitoring task?

Participant: getting a remote interview and at the same time there's someone back in the office monitoring our interview  and so far the live transcript is updating correctly  so that's good

Moderator: That's great to hear that the remote interview and live transcription are going smoothly. How do you feel about having someone monitoring the interview from the office? Does it affect your performance in any way?
